content:
Mashihaa hathanaakum-paavanayaam puri yerushalem
Thankolayaal paazhaamennum
Sabhayuththhaanatthaal -valuthaamennum baabelil
Pravachichaan-nibi daaneeyel
Haaleluyyaa-krooshicholle bhanyjichon
Sabhayin-manavaallan dhanyan.

Balavum mahimaavum-jayavum chernnadhiraajasuthan
Mudraykkethum ke-denye kallarayil ninnum
Velliyil vannu vaathil kaappaan-ninnavare lajippichu.
